name: Roll of Fortune
description:
A Rougelike x Strategy x Board game where you fight through rooms with the abilities provided from your dice. Will you be able to reach the end of the dungeon?

Left click to move and attack

Click on yourself to skip a turn

F11 for fullscreen.

THE WEB CLIENT HAS SOME ISSUES, notably with game overs and the credits; For the best experience, please use the executable!

Thank you for playing :D

Music Generated using Musenet, then heavily modified.

Payne, Christine. "MuseNet." OpenAI, 25 Apr. 2019, openai.com/blog/musenet

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022
